name: DevTaskTimer
short_description: Are you tired of trying to remember how much time you spent on a particular task which was assigned to you, to fill out a timesheet, or account for task-actuals?  Are you preempted throughout the day, and have a hard time remembering when you stopped working on one task, and started on another?  DevTaskTimer is for you!  DevTaskTimer is an Android application which keeps multiple timers in various states, to correspond with your work.  When you complete a task, upload the progress to your task system.  Reduce the overhead required to interface with your task system, and spend more time on product!
summary: Keep track of time spent on tasks from your phone!
